animeDescription: Ikumi is an up-and-coming pop singer with millions of fans and a promising acting career. She should be looking at the world through rose-colored glasses, but she's got man trouble.The love of her life just isn't sure he can handle Ikumi's fame and fortune. To make matters worse, while shooting on location, a jealous costar finds a strange wooden idol in an abandoned temple and uses it to invoke a hideous demon to be the instrument of her revenge. Will Ikumi's next concert be her last curtain call? She's about to discover that there really are fates worse than death.
